com.google.code.siren4j.resource
Interface Resource

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseResource, CollectionResource
public interface Resource

Method Summary
 Collection<Action> getEntityActions()
          Get actions set on this resource by the setter method, does not retrieve those set by annotation.
 Collection<Link> getEntityLinks()
          Get links set on this resource by the setter method, does not retrieve those set by annotation.
 Boolean getOverrideEmbeddedLink()
          Retrieve the override embedded link setting if set.
 String getOverrideUri()
          Retrieve the override uri if set.
 void setEntityActions(Collection<Action> actions)
          Set actions for this entity resource.
 void setEntityLinks(Collection<Link> links)
          Set links for this entity resource.
 void setOverrideEmbeddedLink(Boolean isEmbeddedLink)
          Override annotation settings indicating that if this is a sub entity and if it should be an embedded link.
 void setOverrideUri(String uri)
          Overrides annotation settings for the uri of this resource.
 

Method Detail

setOverrideUri

void setOverrideUri(String uri)
Overrides annotation settings for the uri of this resource. The override ONLY occurs if this method is called.

Parameters:
uri - the uri to override with. Cannot be null or empty.

getOverrideUri

String getOverrideUri()
Retrieve the override uri if set.

Returns:
override uri or null if not set.

setOverrideEmbeddedLink

void setOverrideEmbeddedLink(Boolean isEmbeddedLink)
Override annotation settings indicating that if this is a sub entity and if it should be an embedded link. The override ONLY occurs if this method is called.

Parameters:
isEmbeddedLink -

getOverrideEmbeddedLink

Boolean getOverrideEmbeddedLink()
Retrieve the override embedded link setting if set.

Returns:
null if not set.

setEntityLinks

void setEntityLinks(Collection<Link> links)
Set links for this entity resource. These will be merged with links set by annotation by the reflecting converter.. Links set here will override the same named links done in annotations.

Parameters:
links - may be null or empty.

getEntityLinks

Collection<Link> getEntityLinks()
Get links set on this resource by the setter method, does not retrieve those set by annotation.

Returns:
links for the entity, may be null or empty.

setEntityActions

void setEntityActions(Collection<Action> actions)
Set actions for this entity resource. These will be merged with actions set by annotation by the reflecting converter. Actions set here will override the same named actions done in annotations.

Parameters:
actions - may be null or empty.

getEntityActions

Collection<Action> getEntityActions()
Get actions set on this resource by the setter method, does not retrieve those set by annotation.

Returns:
actions may be null or empty.
